description:
Jahi has a new plan to get Doux to become more demon like, but a divine messenger gets in the way.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kami no Tsukai ga Meiwaku Sugiru!! / Kami no Tsukai (Shin) wa Chi no Ke ga Oosugiru!!
The Divine Messenger Is Too Much Trouble!! / The Divine Messenger (the Real One) Is Too Hot-Headed!!
神の使いが迷惑すぎる!! / 神の使い(真)は血の気が多すぎる!!
